text: John Persen (9 November 1941 - 12 December 2014) was a Norwegian composer. He was born in Porsanger, Norway. He was the son-in-law of Finn Str√∏msted. He was awarded Lindemanprisen in 1999, and Edvardprisen twice, and was awarded honorary membership of the Norwegian Society of Composers. Persen died in Oslo, Norway, aged 73. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Norwegian composers
title: John Persen
